translations: 座谈会（colloquium 的复数）；学术研讨会

sentences.sentence: Hold colloquia aperiodically, in order to deal with the problems lessees would meet in business.
sentences.translation: 不定期招开商家座谈会，为商家解决在经营中遇到的困难。

sentences.sentence: See residential colloquia details Clinical Training Requirements: 600 practicum hours and accompanying course work.
sentences.translation: 细节见住宅座谈会临床培训要求：600小时的实习工作和相应的课程。
